CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: To understand the relationship between device performances and active layer morphology , atomic force microscopy ( AFM ) measurements were conducted to investigate the surface morphology of PSFDTBT / PC71BM blend films.

Let's think step by step.

1. PSFDTBT: This is a material name, specifically a type of organic semiconductor material (PSFDTBT stands for Poly(3,6-bis(5-phenyl-2-thiophene)sulfonate-alt-p-phenylene-vinylene) - 2,1,3-Bis(4-tert-butylphenyl)thiophene-4,4'-dithiodianiline).
2. PC71BM: This is also a material name, specifically a material used as an electron transport layer in organic photovoltaics (PC71BM stands for [6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester).
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: To understand the relationship between device performances and active layer morphology , atomic force microscopy ( AFM ) measurements were conducted to investigate the surface morphology of PSFDTBT / PC71BM blend films.

Let's think step by step.

1. device performances
2. surface morphology
3. PSFDTBT / PC71BM blend films
4. atomic force microscopy (AFM) measurements
5. surface morphology of PSFDTBT / PC71BM blend films.

The "Property Name" entities in this paragraph are:

1. device performances (performance of devices)
2. surface morphology (physical property of the surface)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. surface morphology (physical property of the material)

The other entities in the paragraph do not directly refer to material properties. They describe the methods used to investigate the material property.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| surface morphology (of PSFDTBT / PC71BM blend films) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: To understand the relationship between device performances and active layer morphology , atomic force microscopy ( AFM ) measurements were conducted to investigate the surface morphology of PSFDTBT / PC71BM blend films.

Let's think step by step.

1. Device performances
2. surface morphology
3. PSFDTBT / PC71BM blend films

The "device performances" is a property or characteristic of the device that is being investigated. "Surface morphology" is a property or characteristic of the PSFDTBT / PC71BM blend films that is being measured using atomic force microscopy (AFM).
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. surface morphology
2. device performances

These are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to the value of material properties being investigated or measured.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| surface morphology |
| device performances |
